game.name: Stick Monkey
game.description:
Wow! This time we have got you covered with a brand new arcade challenge where your cute friend monkey is there to play with you! Would you like to join him to guide him on his new adventure? Join Stick Monkey and be prepared to help your friend to move throughout this exciting and amazing adventures! Do not bother he is not alone, but his handy stretchy stick will also be there to make his journey complete. It is up to you how far you can stretch it up.

This strong and smart monkey wants to reach his village by moving from one platform to another. Make sure to stretch the stick enough for him to land safely in this HTML5 puzzle game. Be careful and try to stretch it not too long or too short otherwise your monkey will fall down and you would lose the game immediately! Put your brainpower to the test to keep crossing the poles and covering the maximum distance to create your best new score!

Use the bamboo stick to connect the separated poles properly with each other in this cool online game! You will play as a guide or a friend of the monkey so do not hesitate in doing whatever you can do to make his journey successful. This single player game includes fast-paced gameplay, easy controls, and smooth flow on a touchscreen. Good luck to stretch the stick that is a proper length and help monkey to reach his village as fast as possible! Have a blast in our all free arcade games that are playable online for free!

game.mobileControlKeys: PRESS ON SCREEN AND RELESE TO CREATE THE PERFECT SIZE OF SCREEN
game.webControlKeys: CKLICK LEFT AND HOLD AND RELESE TO CREATE THE PERFECT SIZE OF STICK
